price: 我が主*よ、私を不正*者である民の中にはおかないで下さい」。
arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِي فِي ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbi falā tajʿalnī fī al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
